subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: ANAHEIM, Calif., May 21 (AP) — Dwayne Roloson made 33 saves, Fernando Pisani and Chris Pronger scored key goals, and the Edmonton Oilers beat the Anaheim Mighty Ducks, 3-1, on Sunday night to take a commanding lead in the Western Conference finals.
